name: binji

scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev

description: An app where people can share their favorite tv-shows/movies/podcasts. It is valuable because it makes it easier to look for programming to binge watch/listen to in a community of people sharing same interests. One can look at other people's recommendations and pick something to enjoy. A user is able to create a profile and filter programs by services/channels they receive, add/update _“Watchlist”_ and _“Recommendations”_ lists.  Future development may include integration of Facebook Friends lists, creation of custom program lists, and logic to make automated recommendations.
